title: Savoring Bourbon, and Its Storied History, in Northern Kentucky
description: As new distilleries pop up across the United States, the region along the Ohio River remains a particularly exciting destination for spirits tourism.
dc:creator: Liza Weisstuch
media:credit: Luke Sharrett for The New York Times
media:description: Bourbon ages inside white oak barrels at Neeley Family Distillery in Sparta, Ky.
